gui.interfaced.config.description: Configure the way various mechanics function in this mod.
gui.interfaced.config.compass.descriptio: Options for the functionality of Compasses.
gui.interfaced.config.compass.gui_inform: When a Compass is in the player's inventory, various information such as coordinates and the player's facing direction will be displayed on the player's screen.
gui.interfaced.config.compass.compass_to: The player's current location and facing direction will be displayed on a tooltip on Compasses.
gui.interfaced.config.compass.lodestone_: The location of the bound Lodestone will be displayed on a tooltip on Lodestone Compasses.
gui.interfaced.config.compass.recovery_c: The player's most recent death location and dimension will be displayed on a tooltip on Recovery Compasses.
gui.interfaced.config.clock.description: Options for the functionality of Clocks.
gui.interfaced.config.clock.item_frame_r: The world's current time of day and day counter will be displayed above Clocks that are in Item Frames similarly to name tags.
gui.interfaced.config.clock.clock_toolti: The world's current time of day and day counter will be displayed on a tooltip on Clocks.
The time formatting that Clocks will use when information is displayed.
gui.interfaced.config.map.description: Options for the functionality of Maps.
gui.interfaced.config.map.map_image_tool: Maps will display themselves visually on a tooltip while being hovered over.
gui.interfaced.config.environment_detect: Options for the functionality of Environment Detectors.
Environment Detectors can be right-clicked with to display the current biome on a HUD overlay.
The current biome's name, temperature, and weather will be displayed on a tooltip on Environment Detectors.
gui.interfaced.config.miscellaneous.desc: Miscellaneous configurable options that don't fit into any other listed categories.
gui.interfaced.config.miscellaneous.dura: Any item that has durability will display a durability tooltip when it is damaged.
gui.interfaced.config.miscellaneous.food: Any food item will display its properties on a tooltip, such as nutrition, saturation, and status effects.
gui.interfaced.config.miscellaneous.spec: Spectral Arrows will display a tooltip showcasing their Glowing effect for consistency with other effect-giving arrows.
gui.interfaced.config.miscellaneous.note: Note Blocks will display their currently played note on a HUD overlay when interacted with.
gui.interfaced.config.experimental.descr: Experimental options for a bit more intrusive mechanics.
gui.interfaced.config.experimental.chang: Changes the default value of the reducedDebugInfo game rule to encourage using the mod's replacements for the F3 menu. May require restarting!
